libshapedraw.internal

Class LSDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • libshapedraw.internal.LSDController

  • public class LSDController
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal singleton controller class, lazily instantiated. Relies on mod_LibShapeDraw to feed it Minecraft game events.

    • Method Summary

        Called by mod_LibShapeDraw. Dispatch preRender events. Render all registered shapes.
